channel.title: UnlimitedPK!
channel.description:
[b]UNLIMITED PK IS NOW HERE[/b] [u]Forum links in my signature![/u]
Hello, this is a brand new hot server, on a dedicated server which means our downtime will be very low!
Visit are forum for the client download and try it out!
This will be a server very close to stork, not a total replica though.
ALL npcs were deleted and added back in by hand, so there will only be training spots INSIDE wild, except for chickens and men in edge to start out!
[img]http://i50.tinypic.com/mujuv7.png[/img]
125 max stats - Max level 156.
Our exp rate is currently set to 35x out side wildy 50x in wildy, Maybe raised at times.
10 Seconds log out timer in wilderness now fully works
Subcriber rank + 15x more EXP
Drops will not actaully disappear from the ground!
::onlinelist [img]http://img99.imageshack.us/img99/736/heyyhyoyoy.jpg[/img]
No more client crashes!!
Men will drop 250 coins, guards 550, and pirates 1050!
You will start with food in your bank, and some ruby ammys including a full addy, with 2hander.
Portals to get around wilderness
Kill Spree added to Info tab
To find whos online + In wilderness, do ::online,::wildy
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2lizu6g.png[/img]
Check wilderness type by ::wildtype
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/2ia8yme.png[/img]
F2P & P2P wilderness switch NOTE:(Currently can use p2p pots in f2p wild)
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/14sgj2t.jpg[/img]
Capes,Klanks,Monk robes dropped in edge
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2el5hzr.png[/img]
Bankers at edge
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/vsncwi.png[/img]
Buy commands for runes and arrows, current ids to use with ::buy - 31,32,33,34,35,36,38,41,619,11,638,640,642,644,646
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/v3imbp.png[/img]
Range shop in edge [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/ev1b7k.png[/img]
Runes & Staffs shop in edge
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2ec15w7.png[/img]
Castle Rats
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/2ymg36d.png[/img]
Baby red dragons
[IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/hrzh4l.png[/img]
Gaurds - Levl 6 wild up from edge
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/2hs2794.png[/img]
Pots shop in edge
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/4jmi45.png[/img]
Amour & 2hander shop in edge
[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2qb575e.png[/img]
Drop rates are tweaked to cause an stable economy.
you don't get a dragon square, or a dragon medium from shooting kbd for 15 minutes(which is located under dragon maze)
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/nnwriv.png[/img]
To get rune items kill greaters, they will drop (2h, plate, chain, large, legs,kite and 15k coins at times!) Red Drags drop rune and long and axe
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/nfgzuq.png[/img]
Just log in the client with a username and password you wish to use[u](DO NOT USE PASSWORDS FROM OTHER SERVERS!)
[img]http://i47.tinypic.com/do3net.png[/img]
FORUM LINK FOR THE CLIENT DOWNLOAD IN MY SIGNATURE!

item.title: UnlimitedPK!
item.dc:creator: @snoopy89 snoopy89
item.description:
@snoopy89 wrote:

[quote=“CodeForFame, post:41, topic:329125”][quote author=snoopy89 link=topic=425511.msg3131723#msg3131723 date=1266567582]

I’m not advertising, that screenshot could have been taken on any server. I’m here only to laugh at you for being proven wrong by everyone, it’s funny. “Oh my god you have 40 players and F1 on, but I caught you out as I am Snoopy after all, you sir have edited that screenshot and forgot to Photoshop out the text that is peeping through! Nothing gets past Snoopy!!!111”

Fucking spastic.

He is indeed a fucking spastic. His English is shit. He can’t code for shit. He can’t fix a missing sprite. What can he do? Ah! He uploads old sources that are already plastered all over the forums. Nice.

haha lol’d long time ago I uploaded somehting, just because I don’t release stuff doesn’t mean I as stupid as you are shing song… gtfo you chins he go rpe some japanse girls would you, I heard your the best at it fagface
[/quote]

You sir, are mad.[/quote]

Maby my dad is still hitting me.

Read full topic
